title: Stranger Things
description: A group of young friends in a small town uncover supernatural forces and government conspiracies when their friend mysteriously disappears.

title: The Crown
description: Chronicles the life of Queen Elizabeth II from the 1940s to modern times, exploring the political rivalries and romance of her reign.

title: Bird Box
description: A woman and her children make a desperate bid for safety after a mysterious force decimates the world's population.

title: Money Heist
description: A criminal mastermind manipulates the police as his team executes a perfect heist at the Royal Mint of Spain.

title: The Witcher
description: Geralt of Rivia, a solitary monster hunter, struggles to find his place in a world where people often prove more wicked than beasts.

title: Extraction
description: A black-market mercenary has nothing to lose when his skills are solicited to rescue the kidnapped son of an imprisoned international crime lord.

title: The Umbrella Academy
description: A dysfunctional family of adopted sibling superheroes reunites to solve the mystery of their father's death and prevent an apocalypse.

title: Ozark
description: A financial advisor drags his family from Chicago to the Missouri Ozarks, where he must launder money to appease a drug boss.

title: Roma
description: A year in the life of a middle-class family's maid in Mexico City in the early 1970s.

title: Bridgerton
description: The romantic lives of the Bridgerton siblings in Regency-era England, where love and scandal go hand in hand.

title: The Queen's Gambit
description: An orphaned chess prodigy rises from Kentucky orphanage to international stardom, but struggles with addiction along the way.

title: Enola Holmes
description: The teenage sister of the famous detective Sherlock Holmes uses her sleuthing skills to find her missing mother.

title: Dark
description: A missing child causes four families to help each other for answers and forces them to confront their past secrets.

title: The Irishman
description: An aging hitman recalls his possible involvement with the slaying of Jimmy Hoffa.

title: Squid Game
description: Hundreds of cash-strapped contestants accept an invitation to compete in children's games for a tempting prize, but the stakes are deadly.

title: Red Notice
description: An Interpol agent tracks the world's most wanted art thief in this globe-trotting caper.

title: House of Cards
description: A ruthless politician will stop at nothing to conquer Washington, D.C., in this Emmy and Golden Globe-winning political drama.

title: The Social Dilemma
description: Tech experts sound the alarm on their own creations in this documentary exploring the dangerous human impact of social networking.

title: Orange Is the New Black
description: A privileged white woman is sentenced to 15 months in a minimum-security women's prison for her decade-old relationship with a drug dealer.

title: 6 Underground
description: Six individuals from all around the globe, each the very best at what they do, have been chosen not only for their skill, but for a unique desire to delete their pasts to change the future.

title: Mindhunter
description: FBI agents in the late 1970s interview imprisoned serial killers to solve open cases, pioneering criminal psychology and profiling techniques.

title: The Trial of the Chicago 7
description: The story of 7 people on trial stemming from various charges surrounding the uprising at the 1968 Democratic National Convention in Chicago, Illinois.

title: Black Mirror
description: An anthology series exploring a twisted, high-tech multiverse where humanity's greatest innovations and darkest instincts collide.

title: Marriage Story
description: A stage director and his actor wife struggle through a grueling, coast-to-coast divorce that pushes them to their personal and creative extremes.

title: Cobra Kai
description: Decades after the tournament that changed their lives, the rivalry between Johnny and Daniel reignites in this sequel to the Karate Kid films.

title: I Am Mother
description: A teenage girl is raised underground by a robot mother designed to repopulate the earth following an extinction event.

title: Narcos
description: The true story of Colombia's infamously violent and powerful drug cartels fuels this gritty crime drama series.

title: The Kissing Booth
description: A high school student is forced to confront her secret crush when she gets roped into running her school's kissing booth.

title: The Haunting of Hill House
description: Flashing between past and present, a fractured family confronts haunting memories of their old home and the terrifying events that drove them from it.

title: Okja
description: A young girl risks everything to prevent a powerful, multinational company from kidnapping her best friend - a massive animal named Okja.
